title: Yuki No Hana
lyrics: no bita kage wo hodou ni narabe . yuu yami no naka wo kimi to aruiteru . te wo tsunaide itsu mademo zutto . so ba ni ireta nara nake chau kurai . kaze ga tsumeta ku natte fuyu no nio i ga shi ta. soro soro kono machi ni ki mi to chikad zukeru kise tsu ga kuru. koto shi, saisho no yuki no hana wo. futari yorisotte. nagame te iru kono toki ni. shia wase ga a furedasu. amae toka yowasa ja nai. tada, kimi wo aishiteru kokoro kara sou omotta ..
